title: R Training
text: Notebooks package: FaultTree.widget Test (2021-09-30): Notebook testing FaultTree.widget rendering fixes. Advanced R Workbook (Foundations) (2022-06-12): Workbook completing quizzes exercises “Foundations” chapters Advanced R, second edition, comparisons solutions Advanced R Solutions. Advanced R Workbook (Functional programming) (2022-07-31): Workbook completing quizzes exercises “Functional programming” chapters Advanced R, second edition, comparisons solutions Advanced R Solutions. Advanced R Workbook (Object-oriented programming) (2022-08-15): Workbook completing quizzes exercises “Object-oriented programming” chapters Advanced R, second edition, comparisons solutions Advanced R Solutions. ggplot2 (Getting started) (2022-11-20): Workbook completing quizzes exercises “Getting started” chapters ggplot2: Elegant Graphics Data Analysis, third edition, comparisons solutions Solutions ggplot2: Elegant Graphics Data Analysis. ggplot2 (Layers) (2022-11-20): Workbook completing quizzes exercises “Layers” chapters ggplot2: Elegant Graphics Data Analysis, third edition, comparisons solutions Solutions ggplot2: Elegant Graphics Data Analysis. ggplot2 (Scales) (2022-12-03): Workbook completing quizzes exercises “Scales” chapters ggplot2: Elegant Graphics Data Analysis, third edition, comparisons solutions Solutions ggplot2: Elegant Graphics Data Analysis. ggplot2 (Grammar) (2022-12-09): Workbook completing quizzes exercises “Grammar” chapters ggplot2: Elegant Graphics Data Analysis, third edition, comparisons solutions Solutions ggplot2: Elegant Graphics Data Analysis. ggplot2 (Extending) (2022-12-18): Workbook completing quizzes exercises “Extending” chapters ggplot2: Elegant Graphics Data Analysis, third edition, comparisons solutions Solutions ggplot2: Elegant Graphics Data Analysis. R Setup Log (2020-12-30): notes personal R setup. started R journey September 2020 SIRACon 2020. R Training Log (2020-12-02): Notes learning R RStudio.
